venue.address_1: Carter St opp Commuter Rail Station
venue.name: Waltham Station parking lot

item.description:
***NEW:  We're trying public transit this week.  70 bus leaves Waltham center station at 5:58am.  Debark at Western Ave. and N. Harvard Street; it's a short walk down N. Harvard to the stadium.  Return by same bus at 7:23, 7:38 (70A), or 7:50.***  I'll be hopping on at Main and Townsend so you won't see me at Waltham center.

I've always wanted to do this ever since my neighbor told me about it. 37 sections. 1147 giant steps.  Probably 1400' vertical gain for you mountaineers.  
http://november-project.com/stadium/

If you drive separately to the stadium, look for me in the zebra striped hat.

I did this on November 7 and had a blast.  Long review describing what it was like is posted with that meetup:  http://www.meetup.com/Waltham-Trail-Runners/events/90192682/
item.name: Run Harvard Stadium steps with November Project
